1.content:
Jayson, Angela, Sean, Jane, and Rachael are hanging out in Angela's dorm. They're all sitting in a circle and Angela brings out a book.

"Hey guys, check it out!" said Angela.
"What's that?" asked Jane.
"It's a book that my grandfather gave me, he said it has special effects."
"Come on now, really? You called us over so you could read a book to us?" said Sean.
"What kind of special effects?" asked Jayson.
"It says that this book has the power to make you a supreme being in another world." said Angela.
"That sounds pretty awesome, I guess. So we could become gods of another world?" asked Rachael.
"I think so."
"Wait, can only one person use this or can more than one use this?" asked Jayson.
"It says anyone oh wait, it says any person or persons, so we all can enter," said Angela.
"So how does it work, babe?" asked Jayson.
"In order for it to work, it says that all people must be in natural form and nothing must atired. Then one or everyone must say, 'Entrance Portal Open Sesame,"
"Woah, so we all have to get naked to use this?" asked Rachael.
"I think so," said Angela.
"Yeah! Let's go!" said Sean.
"Really? We all have to get naked for this to work?" asked Jane
"Yes, unfortunately," said Angela.
"Alright everyone, take 'em off!" said Jayson.

Everyone starts stripping their clothes. As they were stripping, Jayson couldn't help, but stare at Angela as she was half naked in her pink bra and pink thong. She then unhooked her bra and took it off. She then pulled down her thong and flung it at Jayson. She then laughed at Jayson because she noticed his erection. Everyone was naked now and all them were standing in a circle holding hands.

"Okay everyone say the ritual with me," said Angela.
"ENTRANCE PORTAL OPEN SESAME!" everyone exclaimed.

Suddenly, a bright green swirl emerges in front of them. They are all amazed at the mystic portal.

"So what now?" asked Sean.
"We go in," said Angela.
"Naked?" asked Jane.
"Yes," said Angela.

Jayson, Angela, Sean, Jane, and Rachael walk in the portal. After they walk in the portal disappears. In the other world, a giant green swirl appears over a forrest. Jayson appears first and then the rest of the group appears behind them. They look around and discover that they're in a forrest, but the trees are about 15 inches tall.

"Where are we?" asked Jane.
"I don't know, but everything seems...." said Jayson.
"Small," Angela interrupted.
"Wow Ange, you weren't kidding when you said we'd be the supreme beings," said Sean.
"Yeah, we're like giants. Infact, I think we are giants!" exclaimed Rachael.
"Um everyone, haven't you forgotten something? We're still naked!" said Jane.
"Everyone, calm down! Let's just walk around a bit and figure where we are and what we are," said Jayson.
"Uh, we know what we are, Jayson. We're naked giants and we're in a tiny world where people are about an inch tall," Sean said sarcastically.
"Relax, guys. This could be fun," said Angela as she holds Jayson's hand.

The naked giants walked the tiny forrest together. As they were walking, they were unknowingly crushing trees. They reach the end of the forrest and they find a small medieval-like village of tiny inhabitants. As they approach the village, the tiny people start panicking and running from their homes. Do they giants try to seek help to find out where they are from the tiny people or do they just let them run away and camp in the abandoned village?

12.content:
As the giants approach the town, the tiny villagers run from their homes. The villagers scream and run as the giants enter the village. Angela tries to reason with the tiny village.

"Please, do not be afraid. We mean you no harm," said Angela.
"Forget it, Ange. They're too scared of us," said Jayson as he puts his hand on her shoulder.
"Look at them run. They think we're monsters or something."
"Well afterall, we are giants. C'mon guys, let's camp here for a bit."

As the tiny people abandon the village, the giants walk around the village. Some of the tiny people run back inside their homes while the giants explore the village. Jane accidentally steps on a house. Jane kneels down and starts picking apart the wreckage. Sean helps her pick apart the destroyed home.

"Oh no! I hope I didn't crush anyone!" cried Jane.
"Doesn't look like it. I think it's empty," said Sean.
"Oh I hope so!"
"Okay everyone, watch your step."

The giants continue to walk around the village. Some of the remaining villagers hide inside their homes. Rachael notices a spot where there are less houses.

"Hey guys, let settle right here!" exclaimed Rachael.
"Great Rachael! That way were not crushing anything," said Angela.
"Just watch out for that house right there," said Jayson. "Let's sit right here."

The giants sit together near the south end of the village. Jayson accidentally knocks down a tree. Jane lays down on her back and head misses a tiny house. Angela brushes dirt off of her butt and then sits on Jayson's lap. Jayson holds her and kisses her cheek.

"Ok, we'll camp here until we're all okay with our sizes," said Jayson.
"Dude! My dick is bigger than this tree and I'm not even hard," said Sean. "You know, I never thought being a giant would be so complicated."
"Everyone, relax. You know what we need to do now? We need to play a game," said Angela.
"What kind of game?" asked Rachael.
"Oh I have a good one," said Angela as she starts rubbing Jayson's chest.
"Uh-oh, I think I know where this is going," said Sean sarcastically.
"Woah, someone's horny!" said Jane.
"Are you sure, babe?" asked Jayson.
"Look guys, just because we're giants, doesn't mean that we can't have a little fun," said Angela.
